Nightshift smiles and gently holds Nightlight's hand.

" And don't ever let=
 anyone take that away from ya.  Love is more valuable than energon and it =
lasts forever.  There's plenty of that here alright, lets hope we can hold =
inta that for a long time. "

He shifts his position on the repair bench.

=
" This sure reminds me of Ratchet's med bay.  I must've ended up there so m=
any times that I lost count.  But it wasn't for stupid reasons, usually bec=
ause of freak ambush attempts by Decepticon speedsters.  I sure hated those=
 guys, I wasn't as fast as they were and they knew it.  So of course they'd=
 always chose me as their target.  Ratchet was aware of that, and he never =
got agitated when I came in.  But what was worse, I'd never hear the end of=
 it from Sunstreaker and Sideswipe.  Slag, those two were always rank'n on =
me.  But I tried ta ignore 'em.  Then one day, Ohh this is sweet, one day i=
t happened again and I wound back up in Ratchet's office. Tucson was mak'n =
a delivery of supplies before he got shot blind, and those two were pull'n =
their scrap on me.  Well, not only did he hear them, he saw them do'n it an=
d slag, you didn't wanna be around Tucson that time, because he had the loo=
k of destruction in his eyes.  Now mind ya, they knew better not ta scrap a=
round with him because he'd slag 'em real good if they did.  All they had t=
a do was look into his optics and they turned around and apologized ta me w=
ithout a single word outa Tucson's mouth.  After that, it never happened ag=
ain."

He sighs gently.

" Happy ta say that there was never any ridicule e=
ver said about anyone after that.  Optimus was glad about that, so he let T=
ucson's temper slide somewhat.  It kept the speedsters in line and guys lik=
e us, Hound, Trail Breaker, and Beach Comber were happy not ta get ranked o=
n because of our lack of speed.  And definitely no one ever messed with Rat=
chet.  Ohh no, that was considered taboo.  Maan I sure miss those times."

=
Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.

ened in my life=E2=80=9D

=
> 
> Nightshift turns his head to Nightlight and reaches out to put a frien=
dly hand on hers, to show his support.
>  
> " It's okay, Bump knows what h=
e's do'n.  In no time you'll be back on your feet bust'n Predacon and Decep=
ticon aft from here back ta Cybertron.  And none of those jokers are gonna =
think twice about mess'n with you again. You got someth'n they don't have, =
and never will have, a good spark in you spark chamber."
>  
> He then lies=
 back in his repair chamber.
>  
> " Rodimus is real lucky ta have someone =
like you in his life.  I never got the chance ta find someone back home.  A=
lways too many things go'n on and no time for relationships.  If I could te=
ll the other Autobots someth'n I'd tell them ta enjoy the little things in =
life, the simple pleasures it has ta offer.  Because if ya don't enjoy them=
 while you're alive, you'll never get the chance again after you're gone." =

> 
> Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.
>

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Nightshift smiles and gently holds Nig=
htlight's hand.</div><div><br></div><div>" And don't ever let anyone take t=
hat away from ya.  Love is more valuable than energon and it lasts for=
ever.  There's plenty of that here alright, lets hope we can hold inta=

 the repair bench.</div><div><br></div><div>" This sure reminds me of Ratch=
et's med bay.  I must've ended up there so many times that I lost coun=
t.  But it wasn't for stupid reasons, usually because of freak ambush =
attempts by Decepticon speedsters.  I sure hated those guys, I wasn't =
as fast as they were and they knew it.  So of course they'd always cho=
se me as their target.  Ratchet was aware of that, and he never got ag=
itated when I came in.  But what was worse, I'd never hear the end of =
it from Sunstreaker and Sideswipe.  Slag, those two were always rank'n=
 on me.  But I tried ta ignore 'em.  Then one day, Ohh this is sw=
eet, one day it happened again and I wound back up in Ratchet's office. Tuc=
son was mak'n a delivery of supplies before he got shot blind, and those tw=
o were pull'n their scrap on me.  Well, not only did he hear them, he =
saw them do'n it and slag, you didn't wanna be around Tucson that time, bec=
ause he had the look of destruction in his eyes.  Now mind ya, they kn=
ew better not ta scrap around with him because he'd slag 'em real good if t=
hey did.  All they had ta do was look into his optics and they turned =
around and apologized ta me without a single word outa Tucson's mouth. &nbs=
p;After that, it never happened again."</div><div><br></div><div>He sighs g=
ently.</div><div><br></div><div>" Happy ta say that there was never any rid=
icule ever said about anyone after that.  Optimus was glad about that,=

t ta get ranked on because of our lack of speed.  And definitely no on=

iv>" It's okay, Bump knows what he's do'n.  In no time you'll be back =
on 
your feet bust'n Predacon and Decepticon aft from here back ta Cybertro=
n.  
And none of those jokers are gonna think twice about mess'n with =
you again. You 
got someth'n they don't have, and never will have, a good s=
park in you spark 
chamber."</div>
<div> </div>
<div>He then lies back=

<div> </div>

got the chance ta fi=
nd someone back home.  Always too many things go'n on 
and no time for=

o=
ffer.  Because if ya don't enjoy them while you're alive, you'll never=
